lead_paragraph: The rookie shortstop Trevor Story capped his first week in the majors by hitting his seventh home run, helping the Colorado Rockies beat the visiting San Diego Padres, 6-3.

headline.print_headline: Six Games. Seven Homers. One Hot Rockies Rookie.
headline.main: Six Games. Seven Homers. One Hot Rockies Rookie.

snippet: The rookie shortstop Trevor Story capped his first week in the majors by hitting his seventh home run, helping the Colorado Rockies beat the visiting San Diego Padres, 6-3.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Colorado Rockies defeat San Diego Padres, 6-3; other MLB scores noted.
